name: SurfSmooth
author: AFNI Developers
description: Tool for smoothing data on surfaces using various methods.

inputs.name: Surface File
inputs.description: Option for specifying the surface to smooth or the domain over which DSET is defined.

inputs.name: Smoothing Method
inputs.description: Name of smoothing method to use. Choose from: HEAT_07, HEAT_05, LM, NN_geom

inputs.name: Input Data
inputs.description: File containing data (in 1D or NIML format). Required for HEAT_05 and HEAT_07 methods.

inputs.name: Target FWHM
inputs.description: Blur so that the final FWHM of the data is TF mm. Only for HEAT_07 method.

inputs.name: FWHM
inputs.description: Effective Full Width at Half Maximum for smoothing. Required for HEAT_05 and optional for HEAT_07 methods.

inputs.name: Number of Iterations
inputs.description: Number of smoothing iterations (default is 100 for LM and NN_geom, -1 for HEAT methods).

inputs.name: Output File
inputs.description: Name of output file. Default based on method being used.

inputs.name: Bandpass Frequency
inputs.description: Bandpass frequency for LM method (0 < k < 10).

inputs.name: Lambda and Mu parameters
inputs.description: Lambda and Mu parameters for LM method. Sample values are: 0.6307 and -0.6732.

inputs.name: Interpolation Weights
inputs.description: Set interpolation weights for LM method. Options: Equal, Fujiwara, Desbrun.

inputs.name: Node Mask
inputs.description: Apply operations only to nodes listed in the given mask.

inputs.name: Surface Output
inputs.description: Writes the surface with smoothed coordinates to disk. For LM and NN_geom methods.

inputs.name: Use Neighbors Outside Mask
inputs.description: Allow value from a node neighboring node n to contribute to the value at n even if the neighbor is not in the mask.

inputs.name: Talk to SUMA
inputs.description: Send progress with each iteration to SUMA for real-time visualization.

inputs.name: Refresh Rate
inputs.description: Maximum number of updates to SUMA per second.
